person.name: Katrina
person.topic: A survivor.
Well.
Magincia was destroyed by its pride.
Pride flourishes in the absence of truth, love and courage.Art thou proud?Thy efforts are meaningless.Humility is the virtue that must overcome pride!

person.name: Ghostly
person.topic: I haunt Magincia
Undead in search of peace.
Peace I can never find, forever banished unto the realm of earthbound spirits.
Be not proud of thy little deeds lest ye too fall from the light!

person.name: Skullface
person.topic: I am a nobleman of great birth.
Most superb.
Me and my brother are the last two of the great Meridid family.Thou hast heard of us of course, yes?I thought so.You must not be from near these parts!
A

person.name: Casperin
person.topic: To haunt this shop.
Feeling a bit translucent.
A lot of haunting goes on round here.Know thee why?Pride is the surest measure of goals never attained!Pride!
Seek ye the mantra for humility, ask ye Heywood!

person.name: Faultless
person.topic: Oh, I just hang around!
Been better.
I was hung for my sin of pride!Art thou proud?A grave sin!Pride is evil's favorite sin!
The mantra for pride, being the antithesis of humility, is 'MUL'.

person.name: Heywood
person.topic: Haunt eternally.
As well as can be expected.
Pride goeth before, shame cometh after!Art thou proud?Thou shalt find shame!A proud soul surely knows not its worth!
Faultless knows the mantra of pride ask him!

person.name: Slim
person.topic: I rattle my bones.
A bit on the thin side.
I did value myself far too greatly, that pride was my downfall.Art thou always humble?Doubtful.Take no pride in humility, lest ye destroy it!
A terrible thing!

person.name: Banter
person.topic: I once held the silver horn.
A bit bony.
The silver horn must be used to pass the daemon guard of the shrine.
Wierdrum has been to the shrine of humility!Seek ye the horn?Ask Demitry!Oh.

person.name: Demitry
person.topic: I rattle my bones.
'bout the same as yesterday.
Bones, them bones, them dry bones...Art thou dead?Ah, too bad!Watch out for Nate!
The queen of love has a lady in waiting, she can tell thee more of the horn!

person.name: Wierdrum
person.topic: I haunt, and I haunt, and I haunt!
Haunted.
A haunting job takes more than a lifetime, it takes forever!
Yes, I have been to the shrine, it lies on the north bank in the isle of the abyss!

person.name: Boozer
person.topic: I was once a powerful merchant!
Hic...
My wealth was boundless, I held great power!
A proud soul surely knows not it's worth!Dost thou see?The world goes on without me.The world goes on without me.

person.name: Bulbous
person.topic: I run this shop.
Couldn't be better.
Why, the food shop of course.Can I interest thee in some rations?Hmmm, our stock seems to have spoiled....I sell only the very best.
Well, we're expecting more any day!

person.name: Splot
person.topic: I regret.
Been better.
I was proud, strip thyself of conceits, only the humble are pure!
The root from which all virtues grow!Dost thou seek purity?Then ask the snake of the rune and stone!Fool!

person.name: Ruskin
person.topic: I now try to understand humility.
Not well.
The first test of a great soul is humility!Dost thou seek to know humility?Thou shalt need the rune!A shame.
Ask the snake of the rune, just before it strikes!

person.name: Nate
person.topic: I bring death to all life in Magincia!
Bloodthirsty!
Those who seek the black stone need ask at the pub in Britain!
The sacred rune of humility was banished from this city. Ask Barren in Paws!

person.name: Virtuebane
person.topic: I welcome thee to Magincia! Proud city of the high seas!
Devilish!
Magincia fell unto the realm of darkness for the foundation of their virtue was ill-placed in pride!Art thou proud?Good!Ah.
A
